Windlord:

Windlord arrived where the singal was, he looked the empty pod and 
said aloud "Hello, is anyone there???  I want to help you... You're 
in danger, you don't know it? "

He looked around and he just could find a little fox at the base of 
the old tree stump, could be or could be not the bot that he was 
looking for?

And walked towards Camoflage

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...>" 
<raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Camoflage::
> 
> She slept restlessly at the base of the old tree stump.  She was 
> dreaming of a home that no longer existed.  Her home planet of 
> Kapaflax was once like Cybertron. Made of metal and home to 
billions 
> of bots. Then the plague came.  Now all that was left was a rust 
> cloud that floated about in space.  She was put into a pod and 
> evacuated from the planet by her parents before the plague could 
get 
> to her.  She was 5 when she was put into the pod.  Now she was 9 
> years old.  She slept and dreamed of times gone by. She muttered 
in 
> her sleep, "Yes Mommy, I'll get Daddy to fix the subspace 
> entertainment connection. The Heavily Injured Bots Emergency Bay 
is 
> on tonight. It should be a good one tonight."  She rolled over in 
> her sleep and smiled.
